entries.desc: Core functions and types, available on all supported platforms.
entries.name: kotlin

entries.desc: Library support for the Kotlin annotation facility.
entries.name: kotlin.annotation

entries.desc: Access to top-level properties (document, window etc.) in the browser environment.
entries.name: kotlin.browser

entries.desc:
Collection types, such as Iterable, Collection,
List, Set, Map and related top-level and extension functions.
entries.name: kotlin.collections

entries.desc: Helper functions for creating Comparator instances.
entries.name: kotlin.comparisons

entries.desc: Utility functions for concurrent programming.
entries.name: kotlin.concurrent

entries.desc: Experimental DSL for declaring custom function contracts.
entries.name: kotlin.contracts

entries.desc:
Basic primitives for creating and suspending coroutines: Continuation,
CoroutineContext interfaces, coroutine creation and suspension top-level functions.
entries.name: kotlin.coroutines

entries.desc:
Deprecated support for experimental coroutines, provided for compatibility.
It's recommended to migrate to kotlin.coroutines API.
entries.name: kotlin.coroutines.experimental

entries.desc:
Deprecated support for experimental coroutines, provided for compatibility.
It's recommended to migrate to kotlin.coroutines.intrinsics API.
entries.name: kotlin.coroutines.experimental.intrinsics

entries.desc: Low-level building blocks for libraries that provide coroutine-based APIs.
entries.name: kotlin.coroutines.intrinsics

entries.desc: Utility functions for working with the browser DOM.
entries.name: kotlin.dom

entries.desc: Experimental APIs, subject to change in future versions of Kotlin.
entries.name: kotlin.experimental

entries.desc: IO API for working with files and streams.
entries.name: kotlin.io

entries.desc: Functions and other APIs specific to the JavaScript platform.
entries.name: kotlin.js

entries.desc: Functions and annotations specific to the Java platform.
entries.name: kotlin.jvm

entries.desc: Mathematical functions and constants.
entries.name: kotlin.math

entries.desc:
Standard implementations of delegates for delegated properties
and helper functions for implementing custom delegates.
entries.name: kotlin.properties

entries.desc: Provides the default generator of pseudo-random values, the repeatable generator, and a base class for other RNG implementations.
entries.name: kotlin.random

entries.desc: Ranges, Progressions and related top-level and extension functions.
entries.name: kotlin.ranges

entries.desc: Runtime API for Kotlin reflection
entries.name: kotlin.reflect

entries.desc: Extensions for Kotlin reflection provided by kotlin-reflect library.
entries.name: kotlin.reflect.full

entries.desc:
Runtime API for interoperability between Kotlin reflection and
Java reflection provided by kotlin-reflect library.
entries.name: kotlin.reflect.jvm

entries.desc:
Sequence type that represents lazily evaluated collections. Top-level functions for instantiating sequences
and extension functions for sequences.
entries.name: kotlin.sequences

entries.desc: Utility functions for working with Java 8 streams.
entries.name: kotlin.streams

entries.desc: System-related utility functions.
entries.name: kotlin.system

entries.desc: Functions for working with text and regular expressions.
entries.name: kotlin.text

entries.desc: Experimental API for representing Duration values and measuring time intervals.
entries.name: kotlin.time

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the WebGL API.
entries.name: org.khronos.webgl

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the DOM API.
entries.name: org.w3c.dom

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the DOM CSS API.
entries.name: org.w3c.dom.css

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the DOM events API.
entries.name: org.w3c.dom.events

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the DOM parsing API.
entries.name: org.w3c.dom.parsing

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the DOM SVG API.
entries.name: org.w3c.dom.svg

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the DOM URL API.
entries.name: org.w3c.dom.url

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the W3C fetch API.
entries.name: org.w3c.fetch

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the W3C file API.
entries.name: org.w3c.files

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the Web Notifications API.
entries.name: org.w3c.notifications

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the Navigation Timing API.
entries.name: org.w3c.performance

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the Web Workers API.
entries.name: org.w3c.workers

entries.desc: Kotlin JavaScript wrappers for the XMLHttpRequest API.
entries.name: org.w3c.xhr
